document.full_text: william buford scored 18 points, the freshman jared sullinger added 11 before getting some extended rest, and ohio state looked every inch the part of a no. 1 overall seed. i
document.title: east: ohio state 75, texas-san antonio 46: ohio state routs texas-san antonio in its n.c.a.a. opener
lines_and_colors: william buford scored 18 points, the freshman jared sullinger added 11 before getting some extended rest, and ohio state looked every inch the part of a no. 1 overall seed. i
